messages.reset_confirm_message: All settings will be reset to default values. Are you sure?

app_name.label: Application Name
app_name.desc: Application name displayed in the title bar

font_family.label: Font Family
font_family.desc: Font family used in the editor

show_line_numbers.label: Line Numbers
show_line_numbers.desc: Show line numbers in the editor

tab_size.label: Tab Size
tab_size.desc: Number of spaces per tab character

show_status_bar.label: Status Bar
show_status_bar.desc: Show the information bar at the bottom

show_file_explorer.label: File Explorer
show_file_explorer.desc: Show the file tree on the left

show_terminal.label: Terminal Visibility
show_terminal.desc: Show the terminal panel at the bottom

start_fullscreen.label: Start Fullscreen
start_fullscreen.desc: Start the application in fullscreen mode

performance_mode.label: Performance Mode
performance_mode.desc: Disable some visual effects to improve performance

auto_backup.label: Auto Backup
auto_backup.desc: Periodically back up files to .bak files

max_file_size.label: Max File Size
max_file_size.desc: Maximum file size the editor can open (MB)

error_reporting.label: Error Reporting
error_reporting.desc: Send report to developer when an error occurs
